summary: This is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding a formal request to preserve video surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The footage is requested from the SHU tier containing cell Z06-215, covering the hours surrounding the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein on July 23, 2019. The request is made by Aida Leisenring, an attorney representing another inmate, Nicholas Tartaglione.

keyFacts: A formal preservation request was made on July 25, 2019, for video footage from the MCC New York SHU tier (cell Z06-215) from 11 pm July 22 to 4 am July 23, 2019, related to the 'Epstein incident'.

The request was initiated by defense attorney Aida Leisenring on behalf of her client, inmate Nicholas Tartaglione, indicating a potential link or concern regarding the incident's impact on other inmates.
The document specifies the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred in the early morning hours of July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, which is the subject of an investigation.
The request includes footage from hallway surveillance and potentially from responding officers' body cameras that captured the inside of the cell after the incident.
